data.text: Be part of the @UN’s online consultations on justice. Have your say before the end of December: Details: http://t.co/mpXt0BsIjm #ruleoflaw

Nelson Mandela is now at rest, his long walk complete. May he rest in peace and eternity. - #UNSG Ban Ki-moon at #Mandela memorial.
#UNSG at #Mandela memorial: [Today] we see leaders representing many points of view & people from all walks of life. All here, all united.
South Africa’s democratic transformation was a victory by & for South Africans. But it was also a triumph for the ideals of the UN - #UNSG
"South Africa has lost a father. The world has lost a beloved friend and mentor." - #UNSG Ban Ki-moon at the #Mandela memorial.
